detaileddescription.para: Macro to release a semaphore. The semaphore must have previously been created with a call to xSemaphoreCreateBinary(), xSemaphoreCreateMutex() or xSemaphoreCreateCounting(). and obtained using sSemaphoreTake().
This macro must not be used from an ISR. See xSemaphoreGiveFromISR () for an alternative which can be used from an ISR.
This macro must also not be used on semaphores created using xSemaphoreCreateRecursiveMutex().
